articles.description: Now that we're talking about cervical cancer, let’s focus not on the theatrics of it but on improving vaccine availability and technologies for early detection. | Health
articles.content:
Poonam Pandey may not have lost her life due to cervical cancer, but every year, more than 70,000 Indian women succumb to cervical cancer.

articles.title: Study explains how soil traps carbon - Tech Explorist
articles.description: New findings explain how soil sequesters plant-based carbon from the atmosphere.
articles.content: Soil holds a staggering 2,500 billion tons of sequestered carbon, making it one of Earth’s largest carbon sinks, second only to the ocean. Despite its ubiquity, scientists are just starting to grasp … [+5209 chars]
